Description:
   The dataset can not be edit when the report is created by the old version birt

Steps to reproduce:
  1. download the attached design file
  2. double click the dataset

Actual result:
  In the first to clicking  the dataset, update message is appeared. The second time to clicking  the dataset, an error is thrown out.
